resources.string: Transaction use: For using the transaction, here there are two symbol. First one is up-going, it\'s indicate that we are giving the money to the customer and Second one is down-going, it\'s indicate that we are getting money from the customer

Navigation use: Here there are two option for contacting the customer. First is you can send the whatsapp message to the customer as an autogenerated message that show the current amount for pay. Second is for making the call to the customer.

The Upper window: It is showing your current amount data. It will change after every transaction and their color will be also changed based on the current amount. If amount is need from the customer side it will show as red and in other case, if we need money from the seller/provider their color will be green.
